name: GRANITE POINT MORTGAGE TRUST INC.
OfficialName: Granite Point Mortgage Trust Inc. Common Stock
footnote: The condensed consolidated balance sheets include assets of consolidated variable interest entities, or VIEs, that can only be used to settle obligations of these VIEs, and liabilities of the consolidated VIEs for which creditors do not have recourse to Granite Point Mortgage Trust Inc. At March 31, 2019 and December 31, 2018, assets of the VIEs totaled $1,547,626 and $829,147, and liabilities of the VIEs totaled $1,199,164 and $654,952, respectively.
